com.snakk.advertising
Class SnakkBannerAdView

Object
  View
      ViewGroup
          SnakkBannerAdView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent
public final class SnakkBannerAdView
extends ViewGroup

Banners are ads that are shown within the layout of your app.

XML only implementation example:

Simple code implementation example:

     SnakkBannerAdView bannerView = SnakkBannerAdView.getBannerAd(context);

     // add bannerView to activity layout...

     bannerView.startRequestingAdsForZone("YOUR_ZONE_ID");
Instances of SnakkBannerAdView are not safe for use by multiple threads.

static interface SnakkBannerAdView.BannerAdListener
          Implement this interface to be notified of banner ad lifecycle changes.

startRequestingAdsForZone

public final void startRequestingAdsForZone(String zone)
Start requesting ads for the zone provided.

Parameters:
zone - Identifier of ad placement to be loaded.

startRequestingAds

public final void startRequestingAds(SnakkAdRequest request)
Start requesting ads, using the com.snakk.advertising.internal.AdRequestImpl instance provided.

Parameters:
request - the ad request to be used while making requests

resumeRequestingAds

public void resumeRequestingAds()
Restarts requesting ads from server on the ad update interval.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if a valid com.snakk.advertising.internal.AdRequestImpl was not provided earlier

stopRequestingAds

public void stopRequestingAds()
stops banner ad from requesting new ads

setAdUpdateInterval

public void setAdUpdateInterval(int delaySeconds)
Sets the interval at which a new ad is requested from the server.

Parameters:
delaySeconds - number of seconds to wait between requesting an ad. Set to 0 to disable auto update.

getAdUpdateInterval

public int getAdUpdateInterval()
Returns:
the current ad update interval, in seconds

setListener

public void setListener(SnakkBannerAdView.BannerAdListener listener)
Parameters:
listener - the listener instance that will be notified of ad lifecycle events

getListener

public SnakkBannerAdView.BannerAdListener getListener()
Returns:
the current BannerAdListener object

getCurrentAdWidth

public int getCurrentAdWidth()
Returns:
the width, in pixels, of the currently loaded ad, or -1 if no ad is currently available

getCurrentAdHeight

public int getCurrentAdHeight()
Returns:
the height, in pixels, of the currently loaded ad, or -1 if no ad is currently available

updateLocation

public void updateLocation(double latitude,
                           double longitude)
Set the location coordinates for geo-targeting.

Parameters:
latitude - the latitude in decimal degrees
longitude - the longitude in decimal degrees
